pages.text: Chimneys are structures and kitchen facilities consist of flue and pot. Like other kitchen facilities, They have variants of different $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)kitchen materials$(/l).
Chimney flue can extend the length of the chimney. They can be either long or short.
Chimney pot must be placed on the top of the chimney structure, it doesn't need to be of the same type with chimney flue
Chimney structure can only extend vertically up, and should not be blocked between smoke source and itself
Ash accumulates when the chimney pot is in use. Can be collected with shovel at the chimney pot.They are useful in dye crafting.
